name: LIChess Giant ChessBoard
additional_info:
version 0.1
LIChess with Giant ChessBoard 720x720px
When you playing, the crosstable is hidden
Captured pieces is hidden, particulary when watching TV because the option is not taken into account.

Todo:
Hide or deport the left column to the right when playing, watching game.
Perhaps convert into greasemonkey userscript for more flexibility. 

Requirement:
Stylish extension:
for firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/stylish/
for Chrome/Chromium/Iron: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe
